2: 1 You are a good teacher.Are you a good teacher?You are not a good teacher.
2 She is a pupil.Is she a pupil?She is not a pupil.
3 He is in Chicago.Is he in Chicago?He is not in Chicago.
4 The dog is black.Is the dog black?The dog is not black.
5 The pears are sweet.Are the pears sweet?The pears are not sweet.
6 His book is on the chair.Is his book on the chair?His book is not on the chair.
